meanings: [Proper noun] (especially in plural) A goddess of the seasons; one of the Horae.

vlive.korean: 갑자기 이렇게 호러 특집으로 간다고? - 여름도 지났는데 갑자기 납량특집으로 변해버리냐? Is it suddenly the horror special? - It's not the summer anymore! Is it the horror special? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]ONEUS X LieV - 원어스의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Is it suddenly the horror special? - It's not the summer anymore! Is it the horror special?

examples.korean: The actress was devil-ridden after she played in the horror film. 발음듣기 그 호러 영화를 찍은 뒤 여배우는 정신적 고통에 시달렸다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The actress was devil-ridden after she played in the horror film. 발음

examples.korean: She also made her screen debut in the horror flick Freddy Vs. Jason. 발음듣기 그녀는 또 호러 영화 <프레디 대 제이슨>을 통해 영화에도 데뷔했습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She also made her screen debut in the horror flick Freddy Vs. Jason. 발음

examples.korean: Hollywood produces many different kinds of films, including mysteries, musicals, love stories and horror films. 발음듣기 헐리우드 영화사들은 다양한 종류의 많은 영화를 제작하는데, 미스터리, 뮤지컬, 러브스토리, 호러 영화 등이 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hollywood produces many different kinds of films, including mysteries, musicals, love stories and horror films. 발음

examples.korean: We will dress up as zombies and take pictures at the horror photo zone. 발음듣기 우리는 좀비로 변장하고 호러 포토존에서 사진을 찍을 거야. TIMES CORE
examples.english: We will dress up as zombies and take pictures at the horror photo zone. 발음

examples.korean: Have you seen a horror movie, "Don't Be Afraid of the Dark" recently? 발음듣기 “돈 비 어프레이드 오브 더 다크”란 호러 영화를 최근에 본 적이 있는가? EDU TIMES
examples.english: Have you seen a horror movie, "Don't Be Afraid of the Dark" recently? 발음
